ModMetaData.name: Auto Refuel and Emergency Fuel Trade
ModMetaData.author: FoxMo
ModMetaData.description: 因频繁地手动装填穿梭机燃料而感到厌烦？因穿梭机燃料耗尽而困住地图上无法移动？这个Mod为穿梭机添加了自动从货舱加载燃料，以及紧急燃料交易的选项，你可以在设置中配置这些！\n\nTired of constantly manually refueling your shuttle? Stranded on a map because your shuttle ran out of fuel? This mod adds automatic fuel loading from storage and emergency fuel trade options to shuttles - all configurable in settings!
